Room.Name: Hillcrest Drive
Room.ShortDescription: You are walking along Hillcrest Drive, south of the Panther Headquarters.
Room.LongDescription: The Panther Guards are a small sub-division of the regular city guards that patrol the southeastern section of town. Since much of this area is residential, they are more capable of handling simple disputes in the housing complex or stopping small bar fights in any of the many local bars. On the south side of the road, you can see the impressive Allakaren Pyramid as it stands towering above the city.
